title: Waabi raises $1B to advance autonomous trucks and robotaxis
description:
Waabi plans to apply its Physical AI Platform developed for autonomous trucks to robotaxis with Uber.

The post Waabi raises $1B to advance autonomous trucks and robotaxis appeared first on The Robot Report.
